description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: The annual Henckel Race at Gelsenkirchen; a reception for the Shah of Persia; work at the college of Industrial Design in Ulm; the Hamburg State Opera Company on tour; the German pavilion at the world fair; work of the Central Office of the German Weather Service at Offenbach; German assistance to developing countries; Brunswick football team wins the German League championship.
